channel.title: scannerconfig on nray
channel.description: Recent content in scannerconfig on nray

item.title: tcp
item.description: timeout: 2500ms Timeout for TCP connections. If no response is received within this time frame, a port is marked closed.

item.title: udp
item.description: fast: false Fast sends only known payloads to known ports. The list and payloads are taken from the Metasploit project and it contains currently UDP ports 1604, 53, 137, 123, 524, 5093, 1434, 161, and 111. defaultHexPayload: "\x6e\x72\x61\x79" Since UDP is connection-less, a payload needs to be sent. This option configures the default payload that is sent if no custom payload is specified for a port. ASCII is supported as well as hexadecimal and octal data representation.
